name: Live Support Session
shortDescription: Live support sessions three times in a day to solve your coding related issues.

name: 24/7 Accessbility
shortDescription: Accessibility is the practice of making information, activities, and/or environments sensible, meaningful, and usable for as many people as possible.

name: Expert Co-ordinator
shortDescription: Live support sessions three times in a day to solve your coding related issues.

name: Assignment
shortDescription: An assignment is a piece of (academic) work or task. It provides opportunity for students to learn, practice and demonstrate they have achieved the learning goals.

name: Video Facility
shortDescription: Life time video access and download facility

name: Job Placement
shortDescription: In placement assistance just provides you with the necessary guidance. You have no assurity if you'll get a job or not.
